name: Sam Buffie
description: Sam Buffie is the Lead Event Planner at Roadtrips. As someone with a huge love of travel, she’s built a career around her passion. Sam has been in the travel industry for 20 years and has enjoyed roles in planning, hosting, and writing about travel events around the globe.
